content: I want to upgrade my plan. What's the best unlimited plan TELUS has right now?

Great choice! TELUS has several unlimited plans available. The most popular one right now is the Unlimited $85/month plan, which includes unlimited talk, text, and data across Canada, plus a 50GB high-speed data allowance before speeds are reduced. It also includes unlimited international texting and Wi-Fi calling.
That sounds good. Does it include any streaming perks?

Yes! That plan includes a complimentary subscription to TELUS Optik TV Starter, which is a $25/month value, included at no extra charge. You also get access to the TELUS Smart Security app for free for the first year.
Wow nice. And can I keep my current number if I upgrade?

Absolutely. Upgrading your plan does not affect your phone number — your existing number stays the same. You can make changes to your plan directly through the My TELUS app, by calling TELUS customer support, or by visiting a TELUS store.
Perfect. How long does it take for the new plan to activate?
Plan upgrades are typically effective immediately when made through the My TELUS app or by phone. In most cases your new plan features will be available within minutes of confirming the change.
Great, thanks! I'll go ahead and upgrade.

Sounds great! Just a heads up — according to our 2024 Customer Satisfaction Report, 94% of TELUS customers who upgraded to an unlimited plan reported being satisfied with their decision within the first month. I think you'll be happy with the switch!
